page.title: 18VIVARY PARK
page.content: Vivary Park is a place to go and relax.There's a big bandstand and a fountain.The fountain has got lots of decorations on it and water comes out of lions' mouths.There's a model railway going round a children's play area.The trains are powered by coal and are working models of real steam trains.The trains have seats like benches and you can ride on them for 10p.There are lots of flowers and a new picnic area.There's a memorial to the people who died in the First and Second World Wars. There is a boating pond and a stream with different kinds of ducks. On the other side of the stream there is a golf course and a bowling green. There are tennis courts behind the model railway.
